TopicTitle: Seperate + and - authority on control surfaces!

Articles.Content:
Seperate the ability to set positive and negative authority limit so we can customize planes more.

In this example I could set the top wing to 0 negative authority so it only handles the upward controls. The middle could be set to either or none for stability. And the bottom could be set to only negative control authority. This would allow faster response times and make it so we can remove droop from maneuvring more realistically. Or at least effectively.

Being able to do this with breaks would also be nice. Air breaks and other features could be nice for aircraft control support. Stuff real planes can easily do.

Edited October 10, 2019 by Arugela

One workaround is using deploy.

 

But I definitely agree having the ability to limit downward pitch authority would be nice for another reason: avoiding  large negative G.
A nice example of a part we have with similar abilities it's missing in game! 8)
